title: Learn the interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about green banknotes and finding banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Banknotes in a dream: This dream is one of the dreams that the dreamer wants to know the interpretation of, because of its importance in human life, as it is considered the basic element in buying and selling and meeting his needs. Banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream The dream indicates that the dreamer will gain many good things, in addition to his high status among people and achieving the highest grades at work. Seeing paper money means that he has reached the highest positions in the state that allow him to impose control and achieve more goals and objectives, while losing it in the dream It indicates that there are many skirmishes between all members of his family, and if he drowns, this indicates that all his money has been lost or that he has been exposed to plunder and theft. If a divorced woman sees that she has paper money, this is a sign that God will compensate her with a good husband for the difficult time she went through with her ex-husband and she lives Happily and safely. A son who steals his father’s money is a sign of his satisfying his children’s needs and providing all the necessities. If the wife steals her husband’s money, this is evidence of her care and concern for him. Banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpreter Ibn Sirin believes that seeing coins in a dream is evidence of his participation in Commercial projects and many profits, and indicates that pleasant things will happen in his married life and in the performance of his duties. Finding coins symbolizes the foresight’s acquisition of a large amount of goods, joining a prestigious job and a modern car, and indicates a change in its circumstances from bad to better and dealing with problems. Which she faces in her life. Paying money in a dream in exchange for a purchase means that he will face many misfortunes and problems, and stealing it indicates that he will be exposed to serious risks and he must be careful in his movements before making any decision in his life. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google and get the correct interpretations. Banknotes in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation of money in a girl’s dream as an ambitious and educated person who aims to achieve his endeavors with determination and perseverance and find a job or inheritance in the coming days. Stealing her money in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to danger, and she A warning message, and she should beware of those close to her, and if she sees herself spending lavishly, this indicates the occurrence of misfortunes that will befall her. Her life is disrupted. Some have interpreted this vision as an indication that she is constantly suffering from severe anxiety and confusion, and indicates her failure to perform her duties and the need to return to God, repent, and pray regularly. Banknotes in a dream for a married woman. If the wife obtains old paper money, this indicates She is bored because of her daily life, so she needs to renew her life and get closer to God. If an unknown man gives some money to a married woman, this is evidence that she is not performing her duties regularly and must return to God. If the wife sees counterfeit money, this is evidence

title: Interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing President Sisi in a dream. The interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi indicates many indications, including good and evil. Interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream by Ibn Shirin. We will tell you through the Mukhtalion website about the interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream and what the dream means as follows: Seeing President Sisi In a dream, it is one of the indicators that indicate the praiseworthy things that the viewer is experiencing, especially if President Sisi is laughing. And whoever sees someone in a dream walking next to President Sisi and eating food with him, this is an indication of the great value that the person with the vision will hold. It is known that seeing the President Sisi in a dream is evidence of the pride and dignity that characterize the dreamer. Interpretation of Nabulsi seeing President Sisi in a dreamFrom the interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream, it indicates happiness and great joy for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has become President of the Republic, this indicates a promotion and great status soon. That is, A person dreams that he follows President Sisi is evidence of the many disagreements that the dreamer is in. What is the interpretation of seeing President Sisi for single people? If a single girl sees President Sisi in a dream, this is a sign of happiness and success in her life and God’s vast favor. If the girl sees herself greeting the president Sisi in a dream, this indicates a profit from trade and that she will receive happy news. Interpretation of Sisi seeing a married woman: If a married woman sees President Sisi in a dream, the president coming to visit her at home, this may indicate the end of all disputes between her and her family and her husband. But if a married woman sees In a dream, her husband receives a certificate of appreciation from President Sisi, this indicates his high status and appointment to a higher position. But if a married woman sees that she is talking to President Sisi in a dream and smiles at him, this is a sign of the wealth that she will acquire. What is the interpretation of seeing the president in a dream? For a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees President Sisi preaching in a dream, this indicates the advice she gets from some of those close to her and working with her. If she looks pregnant. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is kissing President Sisi, this is an indication of the great honor that the pregnant woman will receive. Interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream for a man: If a young man sees that he is going to the presidency of the Presidency of the Republic, this is evidence that this young man will travel to one of the Arab countries and obtains abundant livelihood. Whoever sees that he receives a gift from President Sisi in a dream, this is evidence of kindness, sustenance, and happiness in the coming days. If a person dreams that he met President Sisi, this indicates great advancement and many livelihoods that he will obtain. If he dreams If a man sees that President Sisi has come to visit him at his home, this indicates the end of worry and worry and an increase in comfort. If someone sees that President Sisi has come to him at his workplace, this is evidence of profit from the trade in which that person works. Seeing Sisi in a dream in detailIf you see President Als

title: Interpretation of the dream of marrying a married man in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for a married man who gets married in a dream Marriage is the existence of an agreement between any two people and thus they form a family with each other and have children, as well as trying to make their lives free of problems in order to form a strong and cohesive family, and marriage in Islam is done by concluding a legal contract that guarantees the rights Women and protects them, as Islam allows polygamy and remarriage for a man who is married to his wife again, in many cases. And for specific reasons as well.. What is the interpretation of a dream about a married man getting married in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a married man getting married to an unknown woman. Commentators differed on the interpretation of this vision. Some of them said that it was good news for this man, and some of them said that it brought back sadness and grief to him. These are the most important interpretations related to the vision: This husband and his wife are approaching good offspring, if they do not have children yet. The interpretation of this vision also indicates something undesirable, which is death and the imminent death of this person. He is also looking for psychological comfort after the hardships he faced in His life. In addition, changes occur with him that lead to a change in the course of his life. In addition, he faces many problems and difficulties in his life, which he initially finds difficult to solve. The unmarried young man excels in his studies and obtains a new job in a prestigious position. The man's life also becomes easier and he has a lot of money and food in his life. In addition, this vision indicates that he will get rid of the stress and anxiety that plague his life. He also gets a change in his social status, and gets a job that suits him. See also: Interpretation Seeing a new house in a dream and its repercussions. Interpretation of a dream of a married man getting married again. A man marrying his wife to another woman causes her a lot of anger and annoyance, because it is instinctive in a woman’s heart to hate any woman who shares her husband with her. Here are the most important interpretations related to this vision: An unmarried girl gets a lot Of kindness and nourishment in her life when she sees this vision in her dream. It is also involved in doing something wrong, which is an indication of withdrawal from bad deeds. She can also achieve her dreams and goals as well as fulfill her long-awaited desires. In addition, she succeeds in her studies and excels with the highest grades and grades. In addition, you get a new job and in a prestigious place that you have always dreamed of obtaining. Moreover, you marry a man with good morals and live happily with him. She also has a good reputation among her family and those around her. She is also in a relationship with a man and they announce their engagement, but they do not marry. Because of the problems they face. Moreover, she falls into trouble and the person standing next to her is her friend, if she sees in the dream that she is the second wife. See also: Interpretation of seeing palm trees in a dream and its effects. The dream of marrying a man to his beloved. This dream is considered one of the most frequently interpreted dreams. Commentators have repeatedly differed in their interpretation of whether it is good or bad for the person who sees this dream, and we will tell you

title: What symbols do twins appear in a dream?

preview.html: Twin Symbols Many people may want to have children and this may cause them anxiety whether they are able to do so or not, and if they are able to have children, some of them want twins. Are there signs that a woman is carrying twins? Today through various we will find Twin Symbols: What are the signs that indicate Pregnancy with twins? A woman may see a vision in her dreams that indicates that she is pregnant with twins. Dreams differ and their meanings differ. What are these dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins? What dreams indicate pregnancy? If a woman sees that she is eating dates in a dream, this indicates that she Pregnant: If a woman sees her long and beautiful hair in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. If a woman sees money in a dream, this means that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees our master Zechariah in a dream, this indicates that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees a snake in a dream, this means that she is pregnant. God willing, if a woman sees happiness and joy in a dream, this indicates that she is pregnant, God willing. What are the dreams that indicate pregnancy according to Ibn Sirin? If a woman dreams of eating dates, this indicates pregnancy. If a woman sees a sacrifice in a dream, this indicates pregnancy. If a woman sees menstruation in a dream, this indicates pregnancy. It means that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees a crown in a dream, this means that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees herself in a dream eating meat, this means that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees a rooster in a dream, this means that she is pregnant, and God knows best. If a woman sees a cat in a dream, this means that she is pregnant, with God’s permission. God, if a woman sees eggs in a dream, this indicates that she is pregnant, God willing. Dreams indicate pregnancy with a girl? If a woman dreams that her hair is long, this means that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. If a woman sees in a dream that her husband’s face has turned black, this indicates that she is pregnant. With a girl, and God knows best. If a woman dreams that her husband has become a fish, this indicates that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. If a woman sees her sister in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. If a woman sees a deer in her dream, this means that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. If a woman sees roses in a dream, this indicates that she Pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. What do dreams mean about being pregnant with twins? Women’s dreams may differ, but what are they? Symbols of twins in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees a palm tree in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees a parrot in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If she A pregnant woman dreams of shaving a girl, this indicates that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees a lion or a tiger in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees a man’s watch in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams If she drinks a lot of water, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees a bath in her dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins, and God knows best. What dreams indicate pregnancy?

title: Interpretation of a dream about shooting a bullet by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about archery: It is one of the visions that carries many connotations for dreamers and makes them passionate about knowing them because it is mysterious to many of them. Interpretation of a dream about archery: The dreamer’s vision in a dream about archery is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money in the coming period of his life, and this will make him not suffer from financial difficulties for a while. Very long in his life, and if a person sees shooting in his dream, this indicates that he is making a very great effort in that period of his life to be able to overcome the obstacles that have been in his way for a long time and he will be able to overcome them soon. In the event that the dreamer sees shooting in his dream, It means that he will be able to achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time and he will be very proud of himself for what he will be able to achieve. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is shooting and the sound is loud, this symbolizes that he will soon receive unpleasant news that will make him very sad. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a bullet by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the dreamer in a dream shooting and hearing his voice echoing loudly around him as a sign of... That there are a lot of people who are very close to him, but they have an intense hatred towards him and want to hurt him a lot. Discovering the betrayal of a very dear person, and as a result he will fall into a state of extreme sadness. If the dreamer sees gunfire in his dream, this indicates the many problems he will face in his life in the coming period, which will make him feel great pressure and make him feel completely uncomfortable in his life. Which will affect him in his work in the coming period, which will expose him to a huge loss. Interpretation of a dream about shooting one woman: Seeing an unmarried woman shooting in a dream is an indication that she is living at that time in a state of great psychological peace, because she is very willing to avoid things that It causes her extreme discomfort and disturbs her life. I do not like her at all and I wish her very ill. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is holding a gun and shooting bullets, this is evidence that she is going through a lot of turmoil in her life at that time as a result of many problems surrounding her and this makes her feel bad. Things, and if a girl sees in her dream that she is shooting and killing someone, then this represents a very big quarrel that broke out with a close friend of hers in the following period, and she stopped talking to her permanently. Interpretation of a dream about shooting one person in the air: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream because she is shooting Fire in the air is an indication that she is not wise at all in the actions she takes in her life, and this makes her vulnerable to many crises, and if the dreamer sees her shooting fire in the air during her dream, this is a sign that she can get rid of many of the things that were causing her discomfort. Big and she will be very comfortable in her life after that. Interpretation of dreams of shooting a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream being shot is an indication that at that time she is going through a lot.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a rotten tooth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing teeth is considered one of the visions that has different symbolism and associations, and this vision varies according to the cases and details, and this contradiction is due to many things, including that the teeth may be white and healthy, or they may be decayed and decomposed. The person may see it falling or crumbling, or he may remove it himself. What matters to us in this article is that we examine the special meaning of the dream of a rotten tooth with all the special details. This tooth could fall out, be pulled out by hand, or suddenly decay, and we will mention these indicators in the dream of only one person in particular. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth for a single woman from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth for a single woman. Seeing teeth expresses health, freshness, shine, long life, and the enjoyment of many Of the powers and experiences that allow its owner to achieve everything he desires smoothly. This vision also indicates interconnectedness, alliance, love, family ties, close relationships, forming and maintaining friendships, and beginning to engage in many beneficial and beneficial experiences in the long term. Regarding the vision of the tooth, this vision indicates To insight, experience, and familiarity with all knowledge related to a certain aspect of life, and familiarity with many hidden things, and awareness of the nature of reality and its changing events. However, if an unmarried woman sees a decaying tooth, this expresses great anxiety, distress, difficult problems, and intractable issues, and she is going through a period full of crises and confusion over the years. All levels fear that their efforts will ultimately lead to failure and loss. The same previous vision also indicates the shortcomings and defects inherent in the soul and the affliction that makes the girl unfit to associate and form relationships with others. It may seem unpleasant to some. The vision may indicate the many obstacles that stand between him and his desires and goals, or the difficulties that discourage his motivations and morale. And it pushes him to go in mysterious ways that may have undesirable consequences. On the other hand, seeing tooth decay or molars is an indication of bad morals, repulsive qualities, and cruel traits that he will not be able to benefit from, permanent failure, associating with relatives with inappropriate vulgar language and falling into... In bad deeds.Interpretation of a dream of a single woman breaking a tooth by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the molar vision that this vision is interpreted based on the interpretation of teeth, because teeth in a dream indicate relatives, the people of the house and the family, and each tooth resembles a member of the family, the upper teeth which represent Men, while the lower teeth symbolize women. The position of the tooth in this response and interpretation is the head of the family, the grandfather, or the person of high rank whom everyone fears, appreciates, and respects, and whose opinion has weight and reckoning. If an unmarried woman sees a tooth in her dream, this represents family and familial ties. And needs that can only be met by relying on some people, and a constant tendency to advise and listen to the advice and sermons that fall into his ears.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a louse in poetry by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about a louse in poetry and killing it and interpretation of a dream about lice in poetry.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair There is no doubt that seeing lice in reality is not a good thing, as some believe that it indicates a lack of cleanliness and neglect, but we find that the vision has another meaning according to the condition in which the dreamer saw it. Seeing lice in the hair is different from seeing lice on the ground or seeing them falling out of the hair, so we will look at all the interpretations of dream jurists about lice in the hair in a dream. During this article. What is the interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair? Seeing a louse in the hair indicates that the dreamer lives his life happily and abundantly with money without feeling distress or distress. However, if the number he sees is many, it reflects the meaning and indicates misery and poverty. Its presence in old clothes is an indication of debts that have accumulated on the dreamer and he was unable to pay them off completely, which made him feel tense and sad. If a woman sees that he threw her while she was alive without killing her, this is a sure sign that she is on her way to forbidden and wrong ways. If she kills her, this confirms her exit from the crises that were controlling her this time. Her presence in clothes confirms the presence of fraudsters and liars around the dreamer, so he must pay close attention and be more careful in his dealings with others in the coming period. Eating lice on the body is an unpleasant vision that indicates that the dreamer is being stolen by his children. When you see two lice in a dream, this It indicates a major disagreement between the dreamer and one of the people. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, the vision may be a sign of the pain that this patient is suffering from and that he must continue to pray and sympathize with the Creator - Almighty - and he will soon regain his health and recovery. He removes his illness from him. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair by Ibn Sirin The appearance of lice from the hair does not indicate evil, but it expresses a great abundance of nutrition and can also express the growth of children. The dream indicates recovery from the problems he feels in his life if he suffers from an illness or pain in his body. Perhaps it is a sign of approaching crises that may appear to the fortuneteller from his children. Seeing it in a dream confirms that the dreamer is surrounded by hypocrisy and tells us many lies. His fall to the ground after pulling it out of his hair confirms that he is surrounded by evil people who conspire against him and do not allow them to harm him. Combing the hair to remove it is evidence of generosity and comfort from the Lord of the Worlds, as well as a sign of victory over everyone around him. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it by Ibn Sirin It may be a sign that the dreamer has unintentionally wronged one of the people close to him, either with a painful statement or a position. The vision confirms that he will finish his long accumulated debts and that he will get a new source of income in the coming days. The vision is also an expression of his blessed life, who overcame all difficulties in the past, to live happily and freely These days. The dream indicates the dreamer's life away from sadness and pain, indicating goodness and comfort in his psychological and physical life. Interpretation of a dream about lice in a dream by Al-Nabulsi If an amount of lice walks on his body, this expresses his severe stress and his inability to bear it, and it is also a confirmation of the impact of crises

title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about a broken cell phone

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a broken mobile phone in a dream can be an indication of the emergence of problems, disagreements, and anger in the dreamer’s dream and other interpretations, so let us tell you the most important indicators and different meanings of seeing broken. A phone in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and a toy, according to the most famous interpretation scholars Mark Ibn Sirin and Fahd Al-Usaimi. Dream interpretations of broken cell phones. If someone sees in a dream that a mobile phone is broken, this is evidence that his relationship with others around him will be In danger, he may lose a close friend or cause problems with a lover. Breaking or smashing a mobile phone in a dream indicates the loss of someone or symbolizes failure to achieve one of the things that one was striving to achieve, it may be evidence of losing some money. As for falling A phone from someone without damage in a dream indicates a period of testing that the dreamer will be subjected to by those close to him. While the mobile phone is completely broken, this indicates failure, loss, or loss of relationships. Whoever sees in a dream that his phone screen is broken or that it fell from His hand and the screen broke, then the dreamer hears bad news or news that angers the dreamer, but these things do not harm the dreamer at all. If the dreamer is a trader and sees that his mobile phone fell from his hand and broke, then this indicates unpleasant news for his company and a major loss in trade. Interpretation Ibn Sirin dreamed of a broken cell phone. A broken cell phone in a dream indicates that the dreamer has lost relationships in his life or failed to achieve something he wanted. It has also been said that seeing a broken phone in a dream means that something that the dreamer loves has been broken or broken in reality. It could A broken mobile phone in a dream indicates a loss of money or the viewer is exposed to something in which he does not find anyone who can help him from family, relatives or friends. Also, a broken mobile phone in a dream indicates that a person will lose a lot of necessary things in his life. A broken phone indicates A mobile phone in a dream indicates major family problems in life. As for dreaming of breaking a cell phone in a dream, it is a sign of a bad and failed relationship with relatives in life. Breaking a phone in a dream means losing money and falling into major disputes. Breaking a merchant’s phone in a dream indicates bad news that the owner will hear. Vision.Seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream symbolizes health and psychological problems. The mobile phone symbol in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi. The mobile phone symbol indicates existing relationships between people. If it has scratches or breaks, this indicates disturbances in these relationships. As for buying a mobile phone in a dream, it indicates a new life and a wonderful stage in the dreamer’s life, especially if the phone is new and has amazing specifications. For a man, this vision can be a sign of Travel and travel. If the phone in the dream is broken or does not work, this is a sign of conflicts, difficulties and psychological problems. A new cell phone in a dream indicates the satisfaction of a need and the dreamer’s new life, for example

title: Interpretation of a dream about the word kindness in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of the word kindness in a dream. Many people search for what dreams mean. Dream interpretation of the word kindness in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of the word kindness in a dream. Dream interpretation of the word kindness in a dream can be a reference to kindness and sustenance, and God is supreme. And I know that when a married man sees the word kindness, it can indicate a blessing, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the word good, this may be evidence of his attempt to do good, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees the word “good,” it can be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation A dream about the word “preaching” in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the word “preaching” in a dream. Seeing the name Bishara can express good news, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees the name Bishara in a dream, it is evidence of goodness and happiness, God willing. When an unmarried girl sees the name Bishara, it can indicate freedom from worry and grief, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if a married woman sees the name Bishara, it may express About happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the word “I love you” in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the word “I love you” in a dream. Whoever tells me that I love you could indicate trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees someone saying I love you, this may lead to trouble, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a famous person saying, “I love you.” This can indicate goodness and care, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about the word divorce in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the word divorce in a dream. Divorce can be a sign of separation, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees divorce, it may indicate separation or leaving a job, and God knows best. If a married woman sees divorce in a dream This may be evidence of separation from a person, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a divorce, he may hate and envy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the word “month” in a dream. A dream’s interpretation of the word “month” in a dream could be a reference to something important, and God knows best what is unseen, as it could express something. An important thing that happens during the month, God willing. If a married woman sees the word month, it may lead to goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. When she sees in a dream a month, it may be an indication of goodness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of the word death in a dream. Dream interpretation of the word death in a dream could be an indication of losing someone. Loved ones, and God knows the unseen. When we see the word death in a dream, it could be an indication of the loss of a person, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When a single girl sees the word death, it may express a lack of love for her fiancé, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees the word death in a dream, this may be evidence of troubles that will arise. You go through it, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about the words of God in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the words of God in a dream can be a sign of reassurance, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees the word of God in a dream, he can express comfort, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the word of God, it can To prove that it is good, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the word of God, then...

title: Interpretation of a dream about curtains, seeing black curtains hanging in a dream

preview.html: The curtain in a dream for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, whether red, green, white or yellow, and buying fixtures by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of curtains in a dream Curtains mean veiling one’s privacy. Curtains in a dream also represent a close relative, a trusted friend or a wife who covers her husband’s blows, protects his work and protects him from looking at other women. If the expert sees such a dream, the curtains represent his integrity and his honorable wife and children. Unknown curtains in a dream represent fears or anxiety. If the curtains are hanging on the front door in the dream, it means that these difficulties will come from the world. Old curtains in a dream represent misfortunes that will not last. Torn curtains in a dream mean happiness and joy. If it is torn vertically in the dream, it represents quick joy. If he tears it horizontally in a dream, it means slandering the family. Black curtains in a dream mean worries because of money, a child, or the authorities. White or green curtains mean good results. Curtains hanging on the door of a mosque in a dream represent spiritual problems or religious failure. Seeing curtains out of place in a dream means adversity, and seeing them hanging on windows has no explanation. In a dream, seeing curtains hanging over strange surroundings means concerns that will culminate in comfort. Gold-draped curtains mean hallucinations or the negation of one's fears. If a bachelor sees curtains in his dream, it means that he will get married and protect his chastity, or it may mean actions that protect him from poverty. If a fleeing or frightened person sees himself covered with curtains in a dream, this means shelter from what he is afraid of. Falling into a hole while hanging on a curtain in a dream means taking a long, frustrating, exhausting and distant journey. The longer the curtains in the dream, the greater the hardships. Interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream - YouTube. Interpretation of curtains in a dream. Curtains on doors and windows in a dream. Worries and fears with the safety of the outcome. The curtain on the door of the house is from women, and the curtain of the window, window, or balcony is from enemies. The curtains on the door of the factory, shop, or store are tired of livelihood. The gathering and work, and the curtains at the door of the mosque are a deficiency in religion, and new curtains are fleeting, and torn curtains are short or urgent relief, and body curtains are coverings, and large curtains are a varied and great care, and curtains that flap in the wind or wind are dangers that look to the fortuneteller. Interpretation of buying curtains in a dreamA dream about buying Curtains are a sign of visions of marriage or engagement for a single woman, especially if the color in the dream is white. As for buying curtains in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of increased expenses and is also an indication of the covering if it is white or blue. Buying curtains in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male baby if the curtains are dark or made of linen. As for buying white or pink curtains made of transparent or soft fabric, this indicates the presence of a female, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about installing curtains. Most interpreters of the dream see that putting Curtains in a dream are a good omen
